alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 7:20PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Bladen, east central Robeson and north central Columbus Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 719 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Butters, or 10 miles west of Elizabethtown, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Bladenboro, Smiths, Howellsville, Bladen Community College, Abbottsburg, Butters, White Lake, Dublin and Bladen County Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
